body.name: TOTO Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT, Cotton White - CST776CSG#01
features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE WITH LESS FREQUENT CLEANING - TORNADO FLUSH swirls water in a circular pattern to fully wash the bowl surface. CEFIONTECT is an ultra-smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking so that it is easily washed away.
STANDARD HEIGHT FROM FLOOR TO RIM - Standard height is shorter than TOTO's Universal Height for those that prefer not to sit as high.

REDUCE WATER USEAGE WITHOUT SACRIFICE - The 1.6 gallon per flush Drake enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The Drake features a wide 3 inch flush valve and a siphon jet bowl that gets the job done in one flush.

STYLISH AND MODERN DESIGN - Update your oasis with this stylish design that couples well with any bathroom décor. The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in installations and has a left-hand trip lever.

COMPLETE YOUR TOILET - Finish your purchase with the addition of a TOTO SoftClose seat or upgrade to a WASHLET bidet seat. Drake tank and bowl with hardware included. Purchased Separately: Wax ring, flange bolts, and water supply lines.
body.description: The TOTO® Drake® Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH® Toilet with CEFIONTECT® is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. The Drake features TOTO’s TORNADO FLUSH®, a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes CEFIONTECT®, a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. CEFIONTECT, coupled with TORNADO FLUSH, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever. The Drake bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At TOTO, we design simple, brilliant, elegant solutions for basic human needs. That means a TOTO bathroom is always more than a routine. It’s a ritual where every innovation, every detail, is designed with you in mind. For over 100 years TOTO has been dedicated to improving lives around the globe through tirelessly designing and engineering products that deliver innovative technology while still maintaining the beauty expected from TOTO. POWERFUL PERFORMANCE, DEPENDABLE CLEAN Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF Toilet The Drake Two-Piece Elongated TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT is intentionally designed with cleanliness in mind. The Drake features a rimless, hole-free design with dual nozzles that create a highly efficient centrifugal washing action for better bowl rinse after each flush. With the assistance of the CEFIONTECT exceptionally smooth glaze, waste is minimized from adhering to the surface, helping the toilet bowl to stay cleaner longer. Designed with quality materials to ensure longevity and durability. Available in additional colors and features to maximize benefits and coordinate with all bathroom spaces. Complete the set with a SoftClose seat or upgrade with an electronic WASHLET bidet seat.

Effective, Efficient, and Environmentally Focused Cleaning System Powerful Flushing System Our TORNADO FLUSH flushing system generates 360-degrees of cleaning power that reaches every spot. Advanced Clean Technology Our CEFIONTECT ceramic glaze minimizes waste from sticking to porous ceramic surfaces. Improved Water Spot A large water spot that reduces the places where waste can cling to the bowl. Simplified Cleaning The rimless design eliminates places where waste can build up and makes it easier to clean.

Everything You'll Need to Experience Next-Level Clean Everything you need is within reach! This model will come with both tank and toilet bowl included. Simply purchase compatible seat, installation hardware and wax ring. Elevate your experience by upgrading to one of our TOTO WASHLET Electronic Bidet seats, delivering next-level clean and a pampered spa-like feeling after each use.

Choose the Drake That's Right for You! Newly Designed with Everyone in Mind TOTO's Drake Toilet comes in a variety of options to fit your unique needs and complement your bathroom space. Available in standard or Universal Height, 1.28 or 1.6 GPF, 10 or 12 inch rough-in sizes, and with trip levers located on the left or right side of the tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item and easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. 1.6Gallon is very efficient!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal Toilet. Home Essentials was Fantastic.
reviews.reviewText: There is absolutely no better toilet on the market than Toto. I've installed and used them all. Really, no comparison. The quality of the flush is second to none. If you're on the fence, get off it and get the Toto. Stop wasting your money on the cheap box store stuff. Buy once, cry once.In full transparency, I did NOT receive this toilet as part of a promotion or paid review. I bought it with my own money, paying full freight.I had to write a review to voice my complete satisfaction with the seller, Home Essentials. The first order I made had the bowl arrive shattered in the box, but the tank was fine. I immediately contacted Home Essentials and informed them of what happened, and offered to send everything back. I received a reply within an hour telling me they needed to check a couple of things on their end to determine what the best approach would be to get me a replacement. I offered to send pictures. They took my word for it. About 8 hours later, I received an e-mail telling me to keep the good tank, throw out the shattered bowl and they would be refunding my money in full, and that I was welcome to place another order with them. I did exactly that. The new toilet arrived priority and was well packed this time to protect in shipping. Everything was perfect.In this day, you cannot ask for any better customer service. A+ all the way around. I will 100% be ordering another one from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its a Toto
reviews.reviewText: What can I say: Its a Toto which is a reliable brand. It replaced an old toilet with old technology which dumped a ton of water that circled around and around forever before emtpying the bowl. The Toto has a 1.6 and 1.2 gallon option dependent upon how long you hold the handle down to flush. It flushes fast and effectively and looks good doing it. If I had any complaint its that they shorted me on a couple of washers for the tank which was no big deal as I repurposed them from the previous tank.I'm adding an addendum to this review. I can't find this toilet anywhere on the Toto website nore can I find replacement parts for it. There is a universal fill valve that will probably work but the drain valve is exactly that as opposed to a flapper design and I can't find it anywhere. I'll update when I get more information by calling Toto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet, when you can get it in one piece.
reviews.reviewText: Toto makes great toilets, I've had them before and sure this one would have been great as well. The trick is getting it delivered without being broken. You'd think there would be better packaging on these, and it would also help if those handling it used common sense and wouldn't toss around a package that clearly states toilet on the outside of the box. On top of that, Amazon doesn't offer a replacement. You have to return then re-order, and now the price has increased since my order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived in great condition. Plumber installed quite quickly. Flushes good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall Satisfied with Product
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these. My plumber fussed at the brand and it turned out one of them had a broken part inside the tank. The other was installed without issue. Toto was very helpful talking me through testing the broken part, then sending me a new one, which was easy to replace. I was happy with the customer service I received and I am very happy with the look and function of these toilets. I like how they flush and (where the water flows into the toilet....which is different than any toilet I have used before). I knocked a star off for the trouble of having a non-working toilet while I waited for a replacement part. And, I do wonder if I will regret these toilets when other parts need to be replaced and reordered vs. running to the box stores to quickly buy a replacement part. My plumber may not be wrong about the hassle or extra cost of that. Still, I replaced a third toilet with another brand and do not like it as much as these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received quickly and was securely packaged. Flushes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet we ever had!
reviews.reviewText: No more anxiety! Will it go down? How many flushes this time? Or will it get stopped up yet again? These daily quandaries are now relegated to the past. The Toto 1.6 will swallow the most egregious dumps! Had to have it delivered to my nephew who lives out of state, but still saving way more water as it only needs one flush per dump whereas our previous 1.28g needed a minimum of 2 flushes, and often as many as 5 to clear. It’s just amazing to see this toilet in action, I am downright giggly about it!

We have a 2 story home and constantly had to call plumber to snake drains up to down. Purchased Vevor drain cleaner machine which was best investment ever along with Toto tornado toilet to replace American standard and problems solved!! Should have done this years ago! Excellent service from Amazon ! Happy wife. Happy life lol
